introductionHTML:
This is the Alerts page of the Message Center. It shows the alerts that have occurred in the current Admin Server provider.

The "Suggested Action" column is a link, so clicking the cell text may navigate away from this page. Clicking the cell text in a "Has Details" column, expands the row to show more details or contextual information for the action. Clicking the cell text again, will hide the details.

displayedColumns.name: Priority
displayedColumns.label: Priority
displayedColumns.helpSummaryHTML: The priority assigned to an alert.

displayedColumns.name: Severity
displayedColumns.label: Severity
displayedColumns.helpSummaryHTML: The severity assigned to an alert.

displayedColumns.name: HasDetails
displayedColumns.label: Has Details
displayedColumns.helpSummaryHTML: A flag that indicates whether an alert has additional details/contextual information, or not.
displayedColumns.detailedHelpHTML: A flag that indicates whether an alert has additional details/contextual information, or not.

displayedColumns.name: SuggestedAction
displayedColumns.label: Suggested Action
displayedColumns.helpSummaryHTML: The suggested action to take, to resolve or get more context on an alert.
displayedColumns.detailedHelpHTML: The suggested action to take, to resolve or get more context on an alert.

hiddenColumns.name: CreationDate
hiddenColumns.label: Creation Date
hiddenColumns.helpSummaryHTML: The date an alert was created.
